title: profil update in client
body:
hi i thought that the profil is a little bit outdated. i did it with paint

1. i edit 6 more spots for icons. why did i do that? cause if people see my profile i want to share my achievements, for example season icons or purchased icons or the teams i support in the pro scene.

2. i also changed from classic to summoners rift (the box where u can see stats from classic aram dominon) because i want to see stats from the summoners rift map and not from the twisted tree line.

3. seperated stats. u only get 3 icons atm i find it a little bit boring. i updated it because now we have master and challenger icons too. also with that it would motivate people to play the game and focus more on objectives for example towers or wins.

4. i tried to turn the exp bar into gold from purple. since it is a exp bar i wanted it to show my exp atm. and it was gold in season 4.

so thats a few changes i tried to do. it is just an idea. feel free to critcize.

replies.body: I'm not sure if you are aware of it, but this is the italian forum, anyway it is a nice idea, but I don't think riot cares about details like those you show there, honestly.
10000000 times better than normal one, like it is now I can only buy spirit guard udyr and say: "look: i bought it!"
